thread.title: Chrissy Teigen fell asleep during the Oscars and fans can definitely relate
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen fell asleep during the Oscars and fans can definitely relate - Mirror Online

author: mirror.co.uk
title: Chrissy Teigen fell asleep during the Oscars and fans can definitely relate

organizations.name: facebook follow us on twitter celebs newsletter follow @mirrorceleb subscribe

text:
Chrissy Teigen fell asleep during the Oscars and fans can definitely relate It appeared the star had dozed off during the ceremony on Sunday night Share Comments By Alistair McGeorge 09:20, 27 FEB 2017 Celebs Share Comments Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email Chrissy Teigen has stolen the show yet again after appearing to fall asleep during the Oscars - and her fans LOVE it.
The model and all round hilarious star was picked with her eyes closed and head to the side resting on her man John Legend's shoulder as it seemed she dozed of during the ceremony on Sunday night.
Although Chrissy is yet to reveal exactly what was going on, viewers and fans have taken to social media and they can certainly relate.
Chrissy seemed to nod off (Photo: itschristyyall/Twitter) "When @chrissyteigen falls asleep at THE OSCARS and I can def relate because I fall asleep during much less exciting events. #spiritanimal (sic)," one tweeted.
Another joked: "So epic! @chrissyteigen is my idol! I'm not the only one to fall asleep at long shows (sic)"
Chrissy Teigen and John Legend (Photo: WireImage) Chrissy dropped a major leg bomb on the red carpet as she was spotted arriving earlier in the evening with her man John.
He performed hits City of Stars and Audition (The Fools Who Dream) from blockbuster musical La La Land.

The La La Land team had already started delivering their acceptance speech on stage when the mistake was realised, and they handed their statue over to Moonlight.
